{{section-skills-and-equipment}}


Like Skills, Equipment allows a Trooper to perform unique actions or gain exclusive benefits. These special Effects provided by Equipment are detailed next.

{{section-equipment}}


{{important-start}}
Each Level a piece of Equipment can have is separate, and not cumulative with other levels. Therefore, only [[MODs]] and special rules indicated by the Level of the Trooper's Equipment may be used. 
{{important-end}}
